external_games.name: It Comes Around - A Kinetic Novel
It Comes Around - A Kinetic Novel

name: It Comes Around - A Kinetic Novel
summary:
As seen in Singapore's Doujima, Glass of Water Studios is proud to present It Comes Around, born from a partnership between Glass of Water Studios as well as Afterthought Studios (Forgotten,Not Lost & A More Beautiful World)

A ritual to solve the mysterious death of a schoolmate goes horribly wrong, trapping the students and teachers of the Sugimori Occult Club in a horrible game of cat and mouse.

Who will survive this nightmarish hell?
